post.text:

comment.author: Samuel
comment.text: Newt Gingrich crammed it down Megyn Kelly's throat last night! Who in the hell does she think she is? Getting a little big for her britches if you ask me!

replies.author: Dalton
replies.text: I certainly don't trust her any more!
